text.section:
The Authority may:
fix and collect rates and charges for the use of the facilities of a development or project;
establish the terms and conditions for the use of the facilities; and
contract with a person for the person's use of the facilities of a development or project.
The rates and charges under subsection (a) of this section shall be fixed and revised to provide appropriate revenues from a development or project, as the Authority determines.
The rates and charges under subsection (a) of this section are not subject to supervision or regulation by any other unit of the State or a political subdivision.
